name: NES Metroid in Unity
description:
Part of NES Metroid re-created in Unity.

Created by Michael Ye and Austin Wang.

CONTROLS

Use WASD or arrow keys to move. Pressing S or down arrow will activate Morph Ball mode.

Press Z to jump and X to shoot.

Use the Shift key to switch between weapon types.

Press 1 to enable cheats (invincibility and max amount of missiles).

Press 4 to switch to the custom level, showcasing the Blocket power up.
